Elementary Analysis

May 29, 2016

What is software engineering ?

The definition of software is given as,

Software = Program + Documentation + Operating Procedures

Program is the code

Documentation is nothing but a bunch of manuals

Operating Procedures are also nothing but a bunch of manuals

The process of making a software/software product is called software production.

The engineering branch which deals with all the inner and outer aspects of software production is called Software Engineering.

The two of the most popular formal definitions of software engineering are,

â€œA discipline whose aim is the production of quality software, software that is delivered on time, within budget, and that satisfies its requirements" - Stephen Schach
"The establishment and use of sound engineering principles in order to obtain economically developed software that is reliable and works efficiently on real machines" - Fritz Bauer
